protein.specific_function: Removes the secondary (acyloxyacyl-linked) fatty acyl chains from the lipid A region of bacterial lipopolysaccharides

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Hagen FS, Grant FJ, Kuijper JL, Slaughter CA, Moomaw CR, Orth K, O'Hara PJ, Munford RS: Expression and characterization of recombinant human acyloxyacyl hydrolase, a leukocyte enzyme that deacylates bacterial lipopolysaccharides. Biochemistry. 1991 Aug 27;30(34):8415-23.
